title: Distribution of global animal health care market by species 2018
yAxis: Distribution of animal health care market volume
summary: This statistic shows the Distribution of health in the global health were using market networks as of 2019 , sorted 2018 group .
During that period of time , 62 % of adult Companion_animal and 38 % of adult Food_animal used market networking sites .
gold: This statistic shows the distribution of the global animal health care market volume in 2018 , by species.
In that year , health products for companion animals generated some 38 percent of the total global animal health market volume .
